original_text: Manasseh received the land near Tappuah, but the town of Tappuah belonged to the tribe of Ephraim.
korean_text: 답부아 땅은 므낫세에게 속하였으되 므낫세 경계에 있는 답부아는 에브라임 자손에게 속하였으며

sentences.original_text: Manasseh received the land near Tappuah
but the town of Tappuah belonged to the tribe of Ephraim
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 다부아 성읍은 에브라임 지파에게 속했습니다
